revised_title: The Croonian Lecture on Muscular Motion: Observations on the Crystalline Lens and Vision
tldr: The author, Everard Home, discusses the role of the crystalline lens in vision and muscular motion. He explores the refractive power of the lens and its ability to correct spherical aberration, as well as the potential for achromatic lenses in improving vision. The author also shares his experiments on a patient who had a cataract operation, providing valuable insights into the function of the crystalline lens in the human eye.
